# UIActionSheetStyle.default

**Case**

The default style.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Constants

- **UIActionSheetStyle.automatic**: Takes the appearance of the bottom bar if specified; otherwise, same as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActionSheetStyle/default].
- **UIActionSheetStyle.blackTranslucent**: A black translucent style.
- **UIActionSheetStyle.blackOpaque**: A black opaque style.
